desc: FRESH LOCAL FLOWERS HAND DELIVERED - Our in-house couriers personally hand deliver our flowers and gifts, with love and care. Satisfaction 100% guaranteed. Family owned and operated local Northland, New Zealand business!

layout.text: FRESH LOCAL FLOWERS THEY WILL LOVE!

We have the freshest premium grade flowers because they are grown right here in New Zealand by our talented local growers. Our customers and recipients notice that flowers from Mint Floral stay fresher for longer.
